content.rendered: Pasang Kamera CCTV dari Samsung CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-7030RP untuk kebutuhan kamera pengawas. Kamera CCTV Samsung dapat menangkap gambar video bahkan dalam kondisi cahaya yang minim. Kamera Samsung CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-7030RP mempunyai spesifikasi, diantaranya: 1/3 “4MP CMOS network Fixdome 4 megapixel resolution 2592×1520 @ 20fps Lens 6mm fixed focal length H.265 / H.264 / MJPEG codec with Multiple Streaming WiseStream for better bandwidth utilization Wide Dynamic Range with 120dB dynamic True Day & Night with switchable IR cut filter Hallway View (90 ° / 270 °) for vertical display Integrated IR illumination Visibility up to 30 m Edge Storage (Micro SD / SDHC / SDXC 128GB, NAS) Dual power supply, PoE (IEEE802.3af, Class 3), 12V DC For outdoor use, protection class IP66, IK10

excerpt.rendered: 1/3 “4MP CMOS network Fixdome 4 megapixel resolution 2592×1520 @ 20fps Lens 6mm fixed focal length H.265 / H.264 / MJPEG codec with Multiple Streaming WiseStream for better bandwidth utilization Wide Dynamic Range with 120dB dynamic True Day & Night with switchable IR cut filter Hallway View (90 ° / 270 °) for vertical display Integrated IR illumination Visibility up to 30 m Edge Storage (Micro SD / SDHC / SDXC 128GB, NAS) Dual power supply, PoE (IEEE802.3af, Class 3), 12V DC For outdoor use, protection class IP66, IK10
